title: Immortal
description: You do not age or sicken, and whenever you suffer harm you suffer 1-harm less.

title: Unnatural Appeal
description: Roll +Weird instead of +Charm when you **manipulate someone**.

title: Unholy Strength
description: Roll +Weird instead of +Tough when you **kick some ass**.

title: Incorporeal
description: You may move freely through solid objects (but not people).

title: Preternatural Speed
description: You go much faster than normal people. When you chase, flee, or run take +1 ongoing.

title: Claws of the Beast
description: All your natural attacks get +1 harm.

title: Mental Dominion (+Charm)
description: When you gaze into a normal human's eyes and exert your will over them, roll +Charm.

outcomes.text: Hold 3. You may spend your hold to give them an order. Regular people will follow your order, whatever it is. Hunters can choose whether they do it or not. If they do, they mark experience.

title: Unquenchable Vitality (+Cool)
description: When you have taken harm, you can heal yourself. Roll +Cool.

title: Dark Negotiator
description: You can use the **manipulate someone** move on monsters as well as people, if they can reason and talk.

title: Flight
description: You can fly.

title: Shapeshifter
description: You may change your form (usually into an animal). Decide if you have just one alternate form or several, and detail them. You gain +1 to **investigate a mystery** when using an alternate form's superior senses (e.g. smell for a wolf, sight for an eagle).

title: Something Borrowed
description: Take a move from a hunter playbook that is not currently in play.

title: üßü Monster Breed
description:
You‚Äôre half-human, half-monster: decide if you were always this way or if you you were originally human and transformed somehow.

Now decide if you were always fighting to be good, or if you were evil and changed sides.

Define your monstrous breed by picking a curse, moves, and natural attacks.

 Create the monster you want to be: whatever you choose defines your breed in the game.

title: Feed
description: You must subsist on living humans‚Äîit might take the form of blood, brains, or spiritual essence but it must be from people. You need to **act under pressure** to resist feeding whenever a perfect  opportunity presents itself.

title: Vulnerability
description: Pick a substance. You suffer +1 harm when you suffer harm from it. If you are bound or surrounded by it, you must **act under pressure** to use your powers

title: Pure Drive
description: One emotion rules you.  Whenever you have a chance to indulge that emotion, you must do so  immediately, or **act under pressure** to resist.

title: Dark Master
description: You have an evil lord who doesn‚Äôt know you changed sides. They still give you orders, and they do not tolerate refusal. Or failure.
